DOC.brief_title: Reiterative Development Evaluation Study OSA Therapy System
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject age 18 80 . 2 . Subject fluent English understands Study protocol willing able comply Study requirement sign inform consent form . 3 . Subject least one molar four quadrant mouth ( right upper , right low , leave upper , leave low ) . 1 . Poor nasal patency evidence inability breathe nose mouth close . 2 . Oral cavity infection oral dental condition problem would limit subject use ApniCure System ( e.g . denture , loose tooth/teeth , temporomandibular joint ( TMJ ) condition , oral dental condition Investigator believe could exacerbate Attune Sleep Apnea System . 3 . History OSA surgical treatment include uvulopalatopharyngoplasty surgery ( UPPP ) , maxillomandibular advancement surgery ( MMA ) , radio frequency ( RF ) ablation treatment , palatal stent device , etc . 4 . Any concomitant diagnose suspected sleep chronic neurological disorder , OSA , include insomnia , central sleep apnea . 5 . Currently work night , rotate night shift . 6 . Current disease state , use medication treatment , investigator 's opinion , may pose additional risk subject confound result study . 7 . Female subject child bear age pregnant intend become pregnant study period .
